alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 3:40AM PST until February 23 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, highest in the foothill areas. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, with the potential for travel delays and possible road closures.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys
